# cds-textarea

## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                            | Type                                         | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | -------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `class`          | `class`           | CSS Classes                            | `string`                                     | `''`        |
| `controlClass`   | `control-class`   | Control class                          | `string`                                     | `''`        |
| `disabled`       | `disabled`        | Disabled state                         | `boolean`                                    | `false`     |
| `hasFixedSize`   | `has-fixed-size`  | Fixed size                             | `boolean`                                    | `false`     |
| `label`          | `label`           | Label                                  | `string`                                     | `undefined` |
| `loading`        | `loading`         | Loading state                          | `boolean`                                    | `false`     |
| `message`        | `message`         | Message                                | `string`                                     | `undefined` |
| `placeholder`    | `placeholder`     | Placeholder                            | `string`                                     | `undefined` |
| `readonly`       | `readonly`        | Readonly state                         | `boolean`                                    | `false`     |
| `rows`           | `rows`            | Rows                                   | `number`                                     | `undefined` |
| `size`           | `size`            | Size                                   | `"large" \| "medium" \| "normal" \| "small"` | `undefined` |
| `state`          | `state`           | State                                  | `"focused" \| "hovered"`                     | `undefined` |
| `textareaId`     | `textarea-id`     | Unique id (used in textarea and label) | `string`                                     | `undefined` |
| `textareaName`   | `textarea-name`   | Name                                   | `string`                                     | `undefined` |
| `textareaStatus` | `textarea-status` | Text area status                       | `"danger" \| "success"`                      | `undefined` |
| `value`          | `value`           | Value                                  | `number \| string`                           | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event               | Description                                      | Type               |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ------------------ |
| `cdsInput`          | cdsInput event - InputEvent from input           | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `cdsTextareaChange` | cdsInputChange event, contains change from input | `CustomEvent<any>` |
